item.title: Tpda3
item.description: Tpda3 is a classic desktop database application framework and run-time, written in Perl.

item.title: The PlannedCopy Application
item.description: PlannedCopy (plcp) is another tool from my toolbox, an automated copy utility for Linux.

item.title: The data Transfer application
item.description:
This is an introductory article about my (relatively) new open source command line application named Transfer.

Transfer is about transforming and transferring data between files and databases using recipes.

item.title: Sqitch GUI development
item.description: I’m experimenting with a project to make a GUI for the excellent Sqitch database change management application. I started the project some time ago, and because lately it got some attention from the author of Sqitch - David E. Wheeler, I was stimulated to continue working on it.

item.title: My First Module On CPAN
item.description: I have reached another milestone today, I have released my first Perl module distribution to CPAN: Business::RO::CIF.
